column4: Total know-nothing end-user here.  Trying to change the priority of Audacity to realtime, permanently.  Found a forum thread that said to use "renice -<priority> <rhytmbox's pid>"
What is the pid and how do I find it?
it's a number that identifies the process, you can find it by running pidof rhythmbox
or rather, pidof audacity (or whatever the name of the program is)
